xwikidoc.content:
### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_removePlugins=Disabled Plugins ### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_removePlugins.hint=The list of plugins that have been disabled. ### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_removeButtons=Disabled Toolbar Features ### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_removeButtons.hint=The list of toolbar features that have been disabled. ### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_linkShowAdvancedTab=Link: Show Advanced Tab ### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_linkShowAdvancedTab.hint=Allows you to set link attributes such as id, name, class or style. ### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_linkShowTargetTab=Link: Show Target Tab ### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_linkShowTargetTab.hint=Allows you to set the link target attribute (e.g. to open the link in a new tab). ### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_loadJavaScriptSkinExtensions=Load JavaScript Skin Extensions ### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_loadJavaScriptSkinExtensions.hint=Some rendering macros are displayed using JavaScript code. Loading the JavaScript code improves the WYSIWYG aspect of the editor but it may cause problems if the JavaScript code interferes with the CKEditor code or if it changes content outside of the macro output boundaries. ### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_advanced=Advanced Configuration ### Missing: CKEditor.ConfigClass_advanced.hint=You can write a JavaScript snippet to modify directly the configuration object. Check the {0}CKEditor documentation{1} for the list of available configuration properties. ### Missing: ckeditor.content.placeholder=Start typing here... ### Missing: ckeditor.admin.saveComment=Updated the CKEditor configuration from the Administration ckeditor.admin.reset=リセット ### Missing: ckeditor.admin.reset.hint=Restore the default configuration ### Missing: ckeditor.admin.reset.confirmation=Are you sure you want to restore the default configuration? All your changes will be lost. ckeditor.plugin.link.options=設定 ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.link.anchor=Anchor ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.link.queryString=Query String ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.link.defaultLabel=type the link label ckeditor.plugin.link.openInNewTab=リンクを新しいタブで開く ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.list.listType.none=None ckeditor.plugin.macro.placeholder=マクロ：{0} ckeditor.plugin.macro.buttonHint=XWikiマクロ ckeditor.plugin.macro.editButtonHint=マクロを編集 ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.macro.refreshFailed=Failed to refresh the edited content. ckeditor.plugin.macro.dedicatedInsertButtonHint={0}マクロを挿入 ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.title=Officeファイルをインポート ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.filePath=File Path ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.filePath.hint=インポートするOfficeファイルを選択。ファイルをアップロードした後でページに添付し、ファイルの内容をページのコンテンツに挿入します。 ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.filterStyles=フィルターのスタイル ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.filterStyles.hint=Filter text styles like font, color, alignment, margins. Content structure including heading levels, paragraphs, lists and tables are preserved. ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.useOfficeViewer=Use the Office Viewer ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.useOfficeViewer.hint=Check this option if you don't plan to edit the content of the office file after the import or if you don't want to mix the content of the office file with the content that you are currently editing. ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.required=Required ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.import=インポート ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.inProgress=Officeファイルをインポートしています… ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.done=Officeファイルをインポートしました。 ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.fail=Officeファイルをインポートできませんでした。 ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.noUploadURL=ファイルのアップロードURLが設定されていません。 ckeditor.plugin.office.importer.failedToLoadForm=フォームを読み込めませんでした。 ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.resource.notSpecified=The {0} is not specified. ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.save.leaveConfirmationMessage=There are unsaved changes. Do you want to discard them? ### Missing: ckeditor.plugin.save.failed=The content cannot be saved because of a CKEditor internal error.
